Entries.default: An aged dwarf shares this strange floating platform with you. His face is creased by so many wrinkles that his features lie buried amid shadowy pockets of skin. Still, the dwarf's well-practiced habits have left telltale tracks of a welcoming rictus across his visage.
With mechanical stiffness, the dwarf tilts his head and silently gestures toward the empty chair.
The creases of the dwarf's face tighten into a smile as he gives you a courteous nod.
Again, the dwarf bows his head and gestures through the open door. The broad smile on his face is so precisely like it was before that it feels like an exact repetition.

You can see his smile coming before it blooms, reshaping the dwarf's face from a hanging sack of flesh into something resembling an oddly-carved, merry gourd, replete with unhealthy bumps and discolored splotches.
